sentences.sContent: My parents divorced when I was six, and I hardly knew my father.
sentences.sCn: 我六岁时父母离婚，我对父亲几乎一无所知。

sentences.sContent: The children were so excited they could hardly speak.
sentences.sCn: 孩子们兴奋得几乎连话都说不出来了。

sentences.sContent: (= almost no one ) writes to me these days.
sentences.sCn: 如今几乎没有人给我写信了。

sentences.sContent: Dad ate hardly anything (= almost nothing ).
sentences.sCn: 爸爸几乎没吃什么东西。

sentences.sContent: There was hardly any (= very little ) traffic.
She lives in Spain, so we hardly ever (= almost never ) see her.
sentences.sCn: 她住在西班牙，所以我们几乎见不到她。

phrases.pCn: 几乎未来得及就…；刚一…就…
